title: First Look At Charlie Cox’s 2024 Daredevil MCU Return Revealed
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is moving forward with a return from Charlie Cox as Daredevil in 2024. That’s right, Charlie Cox will be making his grand return as the fan-favorite character in yet another MCU appearance ahead of Daredevil: Born Again. Now fans can see the first look at Charlie Cox’s return below. Of course, [...]

title: New Winnie The Pooh Design In ‘Winnie The Pooh: Blood And Honey 2’ Revealed
description:
The first Winnie the Pooh: Blood and Honey film has become quite notorious for turning several iconic literary characters into all-new horror villains. Of course, given the film’s limited budget, it didn’t quite reach its full potential. Now this is set to change with the upcoming sequel, Winnie the Pooh: Blood and Honey 2, which [...]
